History.1: Understand and describe how societies change over time.
History.2: Demonstrate significant knowledge of chronology, geography, and events in history.
History.3: Demonstrate the ability to think comparatively about different societies.
History.4: Demonstrate the ability to analyze original historical documents and sources.
History.5: Demonstrate the ability to analyze interpretations about the past in books and scholarly articles.
History.6: Communicate historical knowledge and analysis in writing or other media.
History.7: Demonstrate the ability to engage in historical thinking and analysis including contextualization, explanation, and corroboration of sources.
History.8: Demonstrate the ability to conduct in-depth historical research and interpretative analysis.
